body.name: Outdoor Broom, 15.7'' Wide Broom, Heavy Duty Broom with Long Handle, Angle Broom with Stiff Bristles, Sweeping Broom for Yard, Garden, Garage (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 26 mins
features: 【15.7” Large Broom Head】The outdoor broom head is 15.7” wide,which is larger than the normal broom.It can sweep a large area at a time with a generous amount of bristles.So you can clean in high efficiency and save your time!

【Special Split-End Stiff Bristles】The heavy duty broom is made of stiff bristles for sweeping heavy things,such as grass, soil, sands, snow, leaves.And the special split-end technology of the bristles is good for pick-up of fine particles, including sugar, salt , crumbs and etc on all hard surfaces.

【53.5” Long Handle Broom】The angle broom is adjustable with 3 poles from 38 inches to 53.5 inches.The top of the handle has a hanging hole to make it easy to storage.You can adjust height of the stiff bristle broom according to your needs and say goodbye to aching back and knees with our premium household broom.

【Multiple Uses】Our garage broom works great for cleaning your house, kitchen, shop, warehouse, garages, decks, sidewalks, outdoor patios, driveways or industrial spaces, workshops, basement, lobby, mall, market, and more exterior cleaning. It can also be used on any surface in your home, including wood, tile, and laminate floors.

【Brooms with Ergonomic Design】 The commercial brooms for sweeping outdoor let you easily sweep under cabinets and reach into corners.It’s easy and labor-saving, compact design with flared bristles can easily reach corners. A best choice for everyday home essential!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yard The large sweep broom can take away the rubbish in the yard, such as leaves, branch, soil. Garden The stiff bristle broom can sweep the grass, concrete floor, stone tile floor. Garage The heavy duty broom can sweep garbage generated in the garage. And if there are rubbishes under the car, you can still use the broom to solve it, the broom handle is long enough to reach most areas. Patio The broom can sweep the rubbish in the patio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy-Duty Multiple Use Broom
reviews.reviewText: This broom is a heavy-duty wide-angle broom with stiff bristles. The stiff bristles make it easier to sweep up heavy things. It is lightweight, and it has a long handle. It is sturdy and adjustable with three poles. The broom is larger than a normal broom, so it covers a wider sweeping area. It’s not just for sweeping the garage or using outdoors, this broom has multiple uses. This broom is much easier to handle than my old push broom. I am very pleased with this heavy-duty broom, and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected it to be
reviews.reviewText: Came in three pieces and was easy to put together. I use this for the back porch. Works well for the most part, but doesn't pull items from the outdoor rugs very well because the bristles are rather soft. Breaks down into three pieces and can be shortened if that is a concern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works awesome but...
reviews.reviewText: When screwing in the handle to the Broom head the actual screw part came out of the stick portion. I just pushed it back in and it is all holding very tightly. I love the huge size of the Broom head. Sweeps and cleans up nicely. Only negative was what I stated but I just pushed it back down hard and it is solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Light weight Outdoor Broom
reviews.reviewText: Our old plastic broom broke a few weeks ago while we were sweeping up old leaves and branches so we needed a new one. This stainless steel broom is absolutely wonderful! It is very sturdy and doesn't buckle under pressure. The broom bristles are thick and angled so it is able to gather and push dirt and other debris. I also like the long handle so I don't have to stoop over while sweeping. This is a fantastic outdoor broom with all the bells and whistles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large angle broom, good for sidewalks, garage and drive.
reviews.reviewText: Covers a lot of territory for an upright broom, allows you to get a good motion for clearing leaves and grass clippings from hardscapes. Lightweight and easy to handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for outdoors, garages.
reviews.reviewText: I order this for our garage and it’s amazing. The broom head is extra long and the bristles are stiff & strong. The handle is very sturdy and made from strong chrome metals. We have a 17” push broom which is inferior to this broom. Highly recommend!
